testcase.name: Verify that the user can able to add the customer details in the guru99 telecom page
testcase.system-out: Given User is in demo guru telecom page.....................................passed When User clicks the add customer tab and enters the FirstName and LastName.passed When User enters the Email Id and the address location......................passed When User enters the Mobile Number..........................................passed And User clicks the submit button...........................................passed Then the customer id is generated succesfully...............................passed
